this is a game about a modern person going back in time to a roman town and experiencing a groundhog daystyle experience there this is a gross oversimplification but this is the general gist of things i really enjoyed the story writing and the many characters and above all sleuthing what is going on and if the above premise sounds intriguing to you then the game is very highly recommended

this is not a puzzle game this is not a detective game this is barely an adventure game consider this a visual novel  you get to see some interesting characters you maybe affect some of them to progress the plot but youre mostly here to read a lot and some random historic trivia but as a visual novel and with deep discound and as a work of almost literally three people  this is great
